医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
围绝经期妇女需要有关经期变化的更好教育和支持伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，围绝经期女性需要更好的教育和支持，了解她们的月经在生殖生命结束时会如何变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Perimenopausal-women-need-better-education-and-support-about-period-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Perimenopausal-women-need-better-education-and-support-about-period-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7589b27-0489-4eed-81e7-a8e6cf14b873 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 13:15:47 -0500 Perimenopausal women need better education and support about period changes
新AI系统自闭症诊断准确率达98.5%根据下周在放射学年会上公布的一项研究，一种新开发的人工智能 (AI) 系统可以分析大脑的专门 MRI，准确诊断 24 至 48 个月大的儿童患有自闭症，准确率高达 98.5%北美协会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/New-AI-system-achieves-98525-accuracy-in-autism-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/New-AI-system-achieves-98525-accuracy-in-autism-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad4a3d3e-0d48-4f8c-94a7-c6811443a0bd Tue, 21 Nov 2023 12:24:59 -0500 New AI system achieves 98.5% accuracy in autism diagnosis
研究人员发现了针对黑色素瘤细胞转移能力的新选择作为一种极具侵袭性的皮肤癌，皮肤黑色素瘤仍然具有高死亡率。最近在对抗致命转移方面取得了巨大进展，但现有的治疗措施在许多情况下仍然无效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Researchers-discover-new-option-to-target-the-metastatic-capacity-of-melanoma-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Researchers-discover-new-option-to-target-the-metastatic-capacity-of-melanoma-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8154ce8e-c36d-47da-9070-b16dd24940e9 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 12:20:50 -0500 Researchers discover new option to target the metastatic capacity of melanoma cells

For routine lab work, the hospital billed her $2,400
